ingredients: 2 cups diced Roma tomatoes , 1   +   1/2 cups diced mango,   +   1/2 cup diced onion, 1 teaspoon white sugar,   +   1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro, 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice, 1 tablespoon cider vinegar,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt,   +   1/2 teaspoon black pepper, 2 cloves garlic, minced
nutrition: Sodium 30mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 2g 1%, Dietary Fiber 0g 1%, Total Sugars 1g, Protein 0g, Vitamin C 3mg 17%, Calcium 3mg 0%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 39mg 1%
